name: PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationProviding
desc: An abstract superclass for a UI app extension to authorize a user to add a payment card to Wallet.

items.name: var completionHandler: ((PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationResult) -> Void)?
items.desc: A completion handler the system calls to find the result of authorizing the addition of the payment card.

items.name: enum PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionAuthorizationResult
items.desc: A value that indicates the result of authorizing the addition of a payment card.
